timeline.message: Map filter methods for in-game strings

timeline.bodyText: is endpoint the best name? maybe link or url? something about endpoint doesnt seam right
timeline.author: hYdos

replies.bodyText: An API endpoint is a pretty standard term
replies.author: ramidzkh

timeline.bodyText: questionable name. maybe call it filterMessage for context?
timeline.author: hYdos
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -71,3 +71,13 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_3244 net/minecraft/server/network/ServerPlayNetworkHan COMMENT

For this to return true, the player must not be actively cooling down. ARG 0 player ARG 1 stack + METHOD method_31275 filter (Ljava/lang/Object;Ljava/util/function/Consumer;Ljava/util/function/BiFunction;)V + ARG 1 message + ARG 2 consumer + ARG 3 backingFilterer + METHOD method_31277 filterString (Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/util/function/Consumer;)V

replies.bodyText: Thing is that it's not just messages, I figured that out in the second commit. It's also used for books and renaming items with an anvil
replies.author: ramidzkh

replies.bodyText: Would be better to name the classes differently then, to include the fact it's used by books and anvils too
replies.author: YanisBft

replies.bodyText: That's my current problem right now, this isn't strictly for chat. It's used by anything where the user and type something, like renaming an item or editing a sign
replies.author: ramidzkh

replies.bodyText: It has been renamed to TextFilterer. Should I drop the er?
replies.author: ramidzkh

replies.bodyText: I would like more feedback on this
replies.author: ramidzkh

replies.bodyText: I haven't received much feedback on this, marking as resolved
replies.author: ramidzkh

timeline.bodyText: THREAD_FACTORY should be fine on its own?
timeline.author: modmuss50
